verses.name: Jeremiah 30:1
verses.text: The word that came to Jeremiah from the Lord, saying,

verses.name: Jeremiah 30:2
verses.text: Thus speaketh the Lord God of Israel, saying, Write thee all the words that I have spoken unto thee in a book.

verses.name: Jeremiah 30:3
verses.text: For, lo, the days come, saith the Lord, that I will bring again the captivity of my people Israel and Judah, saith the Lord: and I will cause them to return to the land that I gave to their fathers, and they shall possess it.

verses.name: Jeremiah 30:4
verses.text: And these are the words that the Lord spake concerning Israel and concerning Judah.
